mapper.insert: INSERT INTO person (world_id, first_name, family_name, money, reputation, battle, knowledge, support) VALUES (#{worldId}, #{person.name.firstName}, #{person.name.familyName}, #{person.money}, #{person.reputation}, #{person.attributes.battle}, #{person.attributes.knowledge}, #{person.attributes.support})
mapper.select: SELECT id, first_name as n_first_name, family_name as n_family_name, money, reputation, battle as a_battle, knowledge as a_knowledge, support as a_support FROM person WHERE world_id = #{worldId}
